title: Sound On: Transition, Virus and Lockdowns
itunes:title: Sound On: Transition, Virus and Lockdowns
description:
Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

“Guests: AB Stoddard, Associate Editor at Real Clear Politics, Drew Littman, Policy Director at Brownstein Hyatt Farber Schreck, former Chief of Staff for Senator Al Franken, and Congresswoman Haley Stevens Democrat representing Michigan's 11th congressional district.”

To listen on the Bloomberg terminal, click on the player thumbnail on the sidebar.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
